item.title: [AMQ-3466] IndexOutOfBounds in kahadb with large number of subscriptions and pending messages
item.description:
When there are several durable subscribers each with a large number of pending messages to be acked the an error occurs, as well as some others involving ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsExceptions and NullPointerExceptions while reading or writing the chunk stream.

item.summary: IndexOutOfBounds in kahadb with large number of subscriptions and pending messages

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Workaround is to increase the pageSize for the index, such that large values do not overflow two pages.
